channel.title: Engineering on Jeanphilo Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Engineering on Jeanphilo Blog

item.title: Sorting Series (Final): Practical Selection - Choose by Scale, Stability, Memory, Distribution
item.description: Practical selection guide: decision tables by scale/distribution/stability/memory, engineering scenarios, test checklist, and common pitfalls to apply the series.

item.title: Do Not Let AI Drive You: Keep the Ability to Build Independently
item.description: How to avoid copy-paste dependence when using AI for coding: Feynman technique, deliberate practice, retrieval practice, and a practical self-check workflow.

item.title: Sorting Series (1): How to Choose an Algorithm - Time, Space, Stability, Scenarios
item.description: Use the ACERS template to map common sorting algorithms by scenario, complexity, stability, and engineering usage, with runnable examples and a selection checklist.
